update menu

mtype = #{mtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
href = #{href,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
